headers: M0 THESIS — DOWNSTREAM READS (who reads what from M0)

rows.M0 THESIS — DOWNSTREAM READS (who reads: Every cluster reads specific M0 fields. If a field is wrong, the cluster is wrong.

rows.col_2: ICP (to understand who we serve), Kill Criteria (to know when to stop hiring)
rows.col_3: Defines hiring criteria, team culture, what "the right PM" looks like for this specific ICP

rows.col_2: All fields (CL-2 is the coordination layer)
rows.col_3: Sequences clusters, schedules sprints, manages dependencies across all fields

rows.col_2: Core Formulation, Form Factor, Flavor Strategy, Target COGS, Price Point
rows.col_3: Builds formulation brief, sources manufacturers, calculates COGS, designs packaging

rows.col_2: ICP (primary + secondary + anti), Positioning, Launch Channel, Customer Acquisition Thesis, Price Point
rows.col_3: Builds funnel, writes creative briefs, designs ad strategy, plans content calendar

rows.col_2: Price Point, Target COGS, Fundraise Target, Kill Criteria, Timeline Kill
rows.col_3: Builds unit economics model, P&L projection, fundraise deck, break-even analysis
Designs content strategy, distribution plan, creator partnerships, organic growth playbook
